English: Law of the Jungle
Is it true that the Demons are causing a ruckus again?
You still haven't heard from the expedition? I heard that powerful Demons showed up and are going around, killing everyone.
And not only that... There's been many incidents, and the Holy Knights of the Church of Lua are being called every day.
I don't think it's something that lowly soldiers like us can do anything about...
That's why Demia from the Guardian Knights gave us the order.
We've been told that unless it's absolutely unavoidable, we should just run away.
Of course. We may be able to deal with one or two low-ranking Demons like Skeletons or Zombies,
but the Undead move in armies...
And there's no way we can fight against high-ranking Demons.
Anyway, if Demons appear, we must report it first.
...!?... Wait... Did you hear that?
Someone's there... Who goes there!?
*Yawn* I can smell it now... I suppose I should get going...
Oh? Orvelia soldiers. Hello.
Huh? Is that kid from around here?
Kid, where did you come from? It's dangerous outside because of the Demons. Go back home.
Want me to take you home?
Huh? No, no need to. Anyway...
Aren't you in danger?
Didn't you say the Demons have been causing a ruckus? You might die?
Well, this is our job...
Since it's come to this, I'll tell you something good.
Look far north. Can't you see something?
Hm...? No, I don't see anything...
Wait, it looks like smoke...
Isn't that Lime Village near the northern sea?
Oh, Lime Village near the sea? That name sounds delicious.
Anyway, that village is about to fall.
It will reach here soon.
The lowly Undead's large army, that is.
Come on. There's no way those lowly Undeads made ships to come across the sea...
And even then, how would you know...?
Look, they're already here.
Mister, wouldn't it be better if you run away now?
They really came across the sea... What was the navy doing!?
Go back to the capital and report to Demia!
What about you!?
We can't leave a little girl alone! I'll take her to the closest fortress!
Come here.
It's gonna be alright. I'll protect you!
*Sigh.* Humans really are annoying.
People who can't even take care of themselves are worrying about others.
A-a Demon!?
You couldn't tell? Keh heh... Well, I don't blame you for that.
The owner of this body was a human after all. Heh heh heh heh!
And I'm a cute little girl, right? Of course, you wouldn't be able to tell.
You evil Demon! You stole the body of a little girl...!
Stole? Heh heh heh, don't say that.
If it wasn't for me, this girl must have been eaten by the crows.
Without the contract with me, she would've died from the wound from another Demon.
Shouldn't I be called her savior? Heh heh heh...
Anyway.
I have no interest in killing weaklings like you.
Though it'll be different if you challenge me.
Alright. I'll give you 10 seconds. Decide if you'll fight or run away.
But if you'll fight me, you better be prepared to die. Heh heh heh!
E-eek!
Just as I thought. Well, those obstacles are gone.
I'm getting hungry...
Well? There might be a high-ranking Demon leading those Undeads...
I'm looking forward to it. Hm hm hm...
Let's see... Shall I start hunting?
You lowly Undeads are nothing!
I can't even get full from you!
And you taste so bad! Ugh, no nutritional value whatsoever!
And worst of all, I can't even get stronger!
Where's the strongest one? Is there no one!?
I'll just kill you all! Kya ha ha ha!
Oh? Are you the leader?
You are pretty big... But you are still a lowly Undead.
And you look too hideous to taste good. No, you don't look like a leader...
Kya ha ha...!!!
Hm hm hm, I really shouldn't associate with Undeads.
They can't even recognize a high-ranking Demon like myself.
And you all keep challenging me! Trash!
*Spit* Ugh. It tastes disgusting.
Fine. I got the information I needed from that soul I ate.
Malduk is their master, huh?
Malduk. I don't think I've heard that name before in the Demon's World...
Did he become a Demon on this side? He became Angmund's adviser right after becoming a lich...
He might be strong, then. I don't like the fact that he's an Undead, though...
Oh, well. It was my goal to eat and absorb Angmund and all his followers, anyway.
So, I have to go to Galluah Plains? I don't think I can go across the sea by myself...
Oh, well!
I'm sure I'll get there if I keep walking. La la la.
The energy from this forest is quite powerful.
Though it's not quite a good fit for me, since I'm a Demon...
Huh?
I think I can smell Undeads on that side...
Hm. Yes, my sense of smell is good.
It's from the sea, so they probably took a ship from Galluah Plains.
Tsk. But this bunch of humans is too damn weak.
They are having a hard time against those trashy Skeletons...
It's pathetic.
Hmph. Who cares about the magic that those lowly Demons are using to make a lowly army?
Who cares?
Now, I suppose I should get going...
Huh?
Evil Demons! Leave Elidora!
You dared to corrupt the queen and insult the pride of the Harpies!?
Get lost, Demons!
I'll destroy you all so you never dare corrupt Elidora again!
And you, the Demon hiding there!
Stop hiding and come out!
How annoying. Well, it can't be helped.
How did you know? I'm pretty sure I should've been sensed as a human.
Ask the wind surrounding you!
Haaaa!
Wait, wait. Calm down.
I'm not related to those trashy Undeads.
I'm on the way to eat the master of those Undeads.
So, can't you just let me pass?
Eat...?
I don't know what you mean... But you're still a Demon! You're our enemy!
There's no way I'll trust anything that a Demon says!
If I think about what you've done to us...!
Come on, you're so stuck up.
Well, if you don't get it, I'll have to show you my skills.
Come at me, birdbrain.
Don't underestimate me, Demon!
Tsk!
Totally different... From the ones before...!
Hmph. You're pretty good for a birdbrain!
I thought everyone here was a weakling.
It looks like I'll have some fun! Kya ha ha!
I told you to not underestimate Harpy warriors, Demon!
I can still fight!
Don't make me laugh, birdbrain.
You don't look too well...
If you continue to fight, the result is obvious.
And I don't think you would taste good, anyway. Hm.
You keep talking about eating. What kind of Demon are you?
Hm hm. Me?
I'm Viska.
I eat the souls of strong Demons to get stronger,
and when I'm finished, I'll be the greatest Demon, the Dark Lord!
Dark Lord?
What the...?
Hey, don't talk like that about someone else's dream.
What's wrong with wanting to be the greatest?
Anyway, I'm on the way to eat the leader of those Undeads.
I'll eat him, grow stronger... And eat some more if there's anything good on the way. Heh heh...
Don't worry, birdbrain.
I have no interest in the souls of creatures from the earthly realm.
Well, I may be interested in your food, though.
Anyway, I'm on the way to eat their leader, so don't get in my way. Got it?
Bye!
A Demon that hunts other Demons?
I'll have to report this to the Elves.
*Sniff* The smell of blood is thick.
Is it because it's right next to the Galluah Plains?
That Malduk... He must be trying to get more corpses.
I'll follow the smell for now.
Hm, this is...
Gahhh!
Guh...
Tsk. Just as I thought...
Another group of weak Undeads?
So boring.
Let's see...
Warriors, to the front! Buy time for the shamans to cast spells!
We'll get rid of those Undeads with the powerful magic!
Let the corpses of our comrades free!
Woooo!!!
Oh? Are they preparing something big?
But...
Rain... Wind... Lightning!!!
Kuh, there's no end...!
They keep rising, unless they're even burned!
Even the warriors are getting tired...
We don't have a choice...
We'll retreat for now and reorganize!
Well, this was the obvious outcome.
They fought pretty well for earthly creatures, but that's their limit.
Well, I'll get going... No, wait.
I think I heard something about Orvel...
Right, there's a traditional dish with a special sauce from the Orcs of Ogria...
A delicious boar dish!
Hmm... I wonder what it tastes like?
...Well, it can't be helped. I'll have to go see...
Boar, boar, delicious boar...
Move! I'll go back to the base... hm!?
Gahhh...
Ugh...
There really are a lot of them.
Oh, well. Even bad souls are enough for some energy...
All of you will be skewered!
That's... a Demon!? Why is a Demon helping...?
And those Undeads that kept rising, even after being hit by powerful magic...
They're unable to get up after getting hit with those thorns...
This is the end!!!
Gwah...
Ugh. Tastes so bad. I feel like I'm gonna throw up...
Are you alright?
I would like to thank you first.
I'm Kaulah, deputy chief of the Orcs.
Aren't you a Demon...? Why would you...?
Ugh. Please wait...
I had so much nasty food that I feel like throwing up... Kuh.
Ugh. I think I might feel better if I have some delicious boar...
...Hm. Is that so?
Follow me, then.
I'll make the greatest traditional food of the Orcs.
(Yes, this is exactly what I wanted!)
Wow, I'm full.
Just as I thought!
And it's so much food! It tastes great!
The food of the earthly realm is really good.
Ha ha ha! I did well in saving those Orcs.
Ha ha ha. I'm glad you like it.
What did you say at the end, though?
Huh? N-nothing. It's so good, that my stomach might explode.
Ha ha, alright.
I wanted to thank you once again for helping us.
But also...
There are some amongst my men who think you are dangerous.
So if you are done here... I would like to ask you to leave.
Hm. You're smart. Well, it's understandable.
I got it. I'm done with my business, and I'm feeling good, so I'll leave.
I hope that didn't hurt your feelings.
But as the leader of my tribe, I would like to know the name of our savior...
Heh heh, if you say so.
My name is Viska.
The Great Demon that will become the Dark Lord!
..? Dark Lord?
Why? Why are you staring at me like that?
Hm... Nothing. I just thought it was interesting.
Why do you want to become the Dark Lord?
Being the Dark Lord means being the best!
Then, I'll be able to eat whatever I want, and do whatever I want.
Basically, it means that I'll have the most fun. Heh heh heh.
Well, becoming the greatest has meaning in itself, I suppose.
Let me ask you something.
If you become the Dark Lord, what will you do about the earthly realm?
Huh? There's no use in bothering the weak races of the earthly realm.
It's not like your souls taste good. As long as I'm not bothered, I won't bother you.
It would be better to let you live and make me good food.
I'll come by sometimes to eat, so treat me well! Heh heh heh...
Hm... You are one interesting Demon.
May I ask why you decided to help us?
I wanted to eat boar... Hm.
Oh, hm... I think there was someone named Malduk...
I heard he's a pretty strong Demon.
I heard he's in the Galluah Plains. Isn't it around here?
Since it's nearby, I thought I might find out something good...
Hm...
What will you do once I tell you?
Isn't it obvious?
I'll go and eat him.
I'll devour the last piece of his soul. All of it. Heh heh heh heh...
So it's the hidden lab in the Galluah Plains, huh?
It should be around here according to that Orc shaman.
I see many low-ranking Demons and Undeads... but an entrance to a lab?
Ugh, fine.
I'll kill them all until I see it!
I was wondering who was causing all that noise.
Who are you?
Who do you think?
I'm Viska, and I'm here to eat you!
Hm. I heard from the Demons...
So, you're that Demon Eater?
Interesting. A strange Demon that absorbs power...
I heard you ate the queen of nightmares, Kitrax.
Oh, that woman that looked like a horse? She was good. Very delicious.
Wonderful. I've been looking for another prey like that...
But looking at you, I don't think you'll be as good.
Hahaha, such a feisty mouth.
Epis, you, and all traitors are the same...
You don't even think about working for Demons.
Don't make me laugh. Since when have Demons worked as a group?
Well, that's enough. I don't want to waste time talking to my food.
Die and become part of my power!
Ugh!? What's this nasty feeling...?
Heh. This is a special trap I prepared in case that traitor Epis appeared again.
It's a pity I wasn't able to capture Epis, but I'll be content with you.
Kwa ha ha ha. It's a good thing I studied her curse.
My body... can't...!
As long as we're in the earthly realm, it's easy to take care of Demons whose real power is just in the mind.
This curse separates the body and mind. Once the mind is dispersed, that body is just an empty doll.
Stay calm and wait there. I'll wait until you get weak and use you as a test material.
I'm already looking forward to researching that power. Kwa ha ha ha!!!
Kuh...!
Tsk. Did the contract get canceled since my mind was separated from her?
The container of that curse... Did he copy her power somehow? Disgusting...
But I still have a way...
Hey, girl. Can you hear me?
The Demon from the contract...
What happened...?
Am I alive...?
Of course you are.
I've kept my side of the contract to keep you alive.
Really...? I see...
And this power from my body...
So, the power I absorbed remained in that body. That's what he meant by research.
Hey, human. Let's have another contract.
Leave your body to me.
Don't feel like it.
...What? Did I hear that correctly?
I said I don't feel like it.
When you use my body...
S-scary things happen...
*...Sigh.* Hey.
Have you forgotten?
The anger from that day. The pain from that day.
Our first meeting was very powerful.
Your friends, family, and parents had become ground meat,
and you were cut up by a Demon's blade, dripping blood, squirming.
Saying you didn't want to die. That you wanted to live. You asked for help. Whoever it was.
And who was the one that helped you then?
Right? It was just me, right?
No one is nice to the weak.
That's the law of the jungle. Only the strong survive.
If you are weak, you get eaten. If you are strong, you eat others.
You are right.
But your power is with me now...
I was asleep, but I saw you fight, so I kind of know how to use it...
Yes. If I can use this power to help people...
Keh heh... Ha ha ha! You really think so!?
Yes, you have the power.
But how much of that power do you think you can take?
And even then, who do you think will understand you?
You are no longer just a human.
For humans, you are just like a Demon.
Hm. You are a Demon-human, now.
Everyone you meet will treat you like a monster, and think of how to get rid of you.
So? You think you can live with that?
Ugh...
And you only saw how it is used, but you never used it yourself.
You'll just die again, without being able to do anything.
We don't have time. Make another deal with me.
If you don't act now, you'll become Malduk's test subject forever.
...You're scared, too.
...What?
Now that we don't have a contract, if I don't agree, you can never use my body again.
And all the power you accumulated so far is in my body,
so you can't do anything. You'll also die at Malduk's hands.
Hmph. You have a point.
But I don't think you'll make that choice.
And this is also a contract for you.
Don't be so on edge, human.
I told you when we first agreed to make our contract, right? I wouldn't let you die.
Even if our contract has been temporarily broken, I keep my promises.
Don't compare me to those lowly Demons or humans who don't keep promises.
You don't understand why I'm asking for another contract?
This is good for both of us.
Your body isn't strong...
But it's good to use on enemies who underestimate you.
And it's good to stay among the humans to get work done.
And what's more, we can eat lots of good food by using your cute appearance.
Well, I also like eating...
Right? Hm hm hm... And you know. If you sign another contract with me...
You can continue your revenge on the Demons for as long as you want.
What, you thought I didn't know?
Of course, I know. As someone who shares your body, it's obvious what you're thinking.
While you were asleep, I saw through your memories.
Not only that. Whenever you woke up for a little while, it was when I was killing Demons.
It's proof that you were also enjoying it.
Your parents, your friends, your neighbors.
You hate the Demons who killed them, right? They're unforgivable?
That's natural.
Tell me honestly. You hate being with me, too.
Yes, you are right.
I hate Demons, I despise them, and I can't forgive them.
I don't even want to acknowledge the fact that I'm sharing my body with a Demon.
But when those Demons were dying in front of my eyes...
I felt somewhat relieved...
Right? SO, let's sign another contract.
Like I said earlier. If we take too long, you'll become Malduk's test subject forever.
Alright. I have one condition.
Condition?
Well, fine. Let's hear it.
You were the one controlling my body before. But now that I'm awake...
Let me use my body, too.
And teach me how to fight.
From now on, I'll kill them with my own hands...!!!
Hmph. That's the right mindset.
You're weak, but you still want to get stronger. And you're willing to put in the work.
Those are virtues that I, as a great Demon, like.
Alright, I accept that condition.
Are you ready?
...Yes.
...Alright, give me your hand.
It will be done soon...
Phew. I finally got rid of that annoying curse.
He just copied her curse, but it didn't feel like an actual one.
The curse she cast on me in the Demon World... Ugh. I don't even want to think about it.
Well. Shall I go get rid of that dirty lich now!?
Found you, Malduk!
...!! Y-you got rid of that curse...! It took me so long to research and perfect it...!
How did you do it!?
Heh heh heh. This is a human's body. As long as it's in a contract with my soul...
There's no way I will lose this body!
No way! The spell I worked on for years was undone by a human soul...!
Damn... Then, I'll put you on the testing bench myself!
Heh. Yeah, right. I want to see you try!
I'll cut you up and eat you!
Hmph. Let's see how long you can talk like that.
Rise, Obrigard!
Rise, my elite soldiers!
Capture that traitor Demon and bring her before me!
Kya ha ha ha!
You think you can use those lowly things to stop me!?
Come at me, Undeads!
I'll get rid of all of you!!!
Kuh, damn!
If it wasn't for the wound from the owner of the Holy Sword and the vestige of Gray!
To be humiliated by a traitor Demon...!
Kuh. I'll have to retreat for now!
I'll go back to Gargoss and report about the situation here...!
Tsk. I was sure I raked out his soul... Was he protected by another spell?
Damn. That rat... So annoying!
He said Gargoss... Alright. Let's see who wins in the end.
Just wait until I get you... I'll rip up your soul until there's nothing left!!!
That's... Hm.
Things are going to get interesting, huh?
